Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class AbstractTaskList

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.AbstractTaskList
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActiveTaskList, TaskList
public abstract class AbstractTaskList extends Object
Abstract class that is the superclass of the ActiveTaskList and TaskList classes.
Author:
Rachel Cantrell and Johnathan Howell

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractTaskList

      public AbstractTaskList(String taskListName, int completedCount)
      Constructor for AbstractTaskList. Throws IllegalArgumentException "Invalid name." if the name is null or an empty string or if the completedCount is less than zero.
      Parameters:
      taskListName - the name of the task List
      completedCount - the number of tasks that were completed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null, an empty string, or if completedCount is less than zero.

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task t)
      Adds a task to the end of the list. Then adds itself to the task's list of taskLists.
      Parameters:
      t - the task to be added

    • removeTask

      public Task removeTask(int idx)
      Removes the Task at the index from the list and returns it.

      Returns:
      the task removed

      Returns:
      the task retrieved

    • completeTask

      public void completeTask(Task t)
      Completes the task. Increments the completed total by 1. Then it removes the task. Note: tasks are identified by ==, not .equals().
      Parameters:
      t - the task to complete

    • getTasksAsArray

      public abstract String[][] getTasksAsArray()

      the array for display
